body: Poor husband he should throw them all out on the street
Technically my favorite hentai of all time
Dayum, people below are so serious. Here Im thinking how good this douj is and comment about it. But, no. Instead, Im here reacting to their "argument" and Im like " Why so serious "

@Moron policeman I loled. This IS a pirating website since they just uploaded entire books that are legally only distributed by Fakku. They got the fucking rights and now they play on the legal playground. For example, I bought Love-Ridden on Fakku and when I compare with the recent upload here, there are missing pages and these pages have the Fakku seal on them. Guess why, genius. Fakku used to be a pirating website just as much a Nhentai, Pururin and a shitload of others, they just decided their fanbase was big enough to switch to legal. If Fakku wanted to sue Nhentai, I wouldn't give this website much time before shutting down or, at the very least, deleting all the Fakku licensed hentais. Nhentai is just not big enough to attract too much attention from Fakku for now.
what ever the shit going on PLEASE tag these works properly.

EcchiBunny, you know Fakku's an actual licensed US distributor in this case, right?
That said, I have no sympathy for them. A knowingly unethical company doesn't deserve ethical patronage.

And Fakku somhow isnt doing the same? 
Please all these sites are at the mercy of translating groups, not a single site does its own translations in such high volume. 
And i much more prefer nhentai layout and clean ui compared to fakku that is cluttered.
These books have always been here, and Faktum can't do shit, it's all just translated hentai, ignore these two idiots below acting like this is a pirating website.
Of course, which is why if you want to keep these you better DL them fast.
What is this avalanche of books ? No, seriously, won't Nhentai have problems with Fakku if they upload their books ?
